subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Murcer, the former Yankee outfielder and its longest-serving current announcer, said Wednesday that a tumor removed from his brain during surgery on Dec. 28 was malignant.
snippet: Bobby Murcer, the former Yankee outfielder and its longest-serving current announcer, said Wednesday that a tumor removed from his brain during surgery on Dec. 28 was malignant.
